lead_paragraph: The estranged wife of former Vice President Joe Biden's youngest son, Hunter Biden, claims he squandered the couple's money on drugs, alcohol and prostitutes since the couple separated in 2015.
snippet: The estranged wife of former Vice President Joe Biden's youngest son, Hunter Biden, claims he squandered the couple's money on drugs, alcohol and prostitutes since the couple separated in 2015....

headline.main: U.S. Prosecutors Fight Ruling Limiting Foreign Bribery Cases
headline.print_headline: U.S. Prosecutors Fight Ruling Limiting Foreign Bribery Cases
